channel.title: Server Base with nice attacks on Npcs?
channel.description:
Im trying to make a new server and i want it to be something like Dodian. Training on npcs not objects...But i cant find a nice server base that has smooth npc attacks.
Help pwease?

item.title: Server Base with nice attacks on Npcs?
item.dc:creator: @Vladie Vladie
item.description:
@Vladie wrote:

You have to add these yourself in npchandler.java, once you add it you can make the hitdiff random hit from lets say 0 to 5 or whatever you choose.
